ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:14:52 [Issue ID 4000-26736] urn:comicvine:4000-26736 urn:comixology:902616 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 13:40:13. [Issue ID 41360]
ComicInfo.Summary: Kro and Thena seek refuge and where better to hide than at Sersi's party of the rich and famous? But when Ikaris and the Deviants crash the party in search of the treacherous lovers, Sersi must intervene. Featuring a humorous cameo by Prince Namor.
ComicInfo.Tags: Deviants,Eternals,Makkari,Ransak the Reject,Jarvis,Sersi,Samuel Holden,Thena,Hercules,Ghaur,Angel,Arishem the Judge,Ikaris,Namor,Dave Chatterton,Kro,Kingo Sunen
ComicInfo.Title: When Titans Party!
